Author: secondrail
Text: Virtual hugs... I know those mom tactics too. :/  But hey, you cleaned your room! That victory will last longer than your mom's tantrum.

Author: Redditnotes
Text: **Then**  I started cycling (12km) to school, allowing me to leave before anyone else and leave a bowl on the side which looked like I had had some cereal and toast. I didn't bring food to school. I cycled back slowly and left school late, so that I missed the evening meal and had to make something myself (hint: I didn't).   **Now**  I live alone and just don't eat for a week at a time. I run in the middle of the night if I feel I've eaten enough. I am completely free, yet completely imprisoned by my disorder.
